name: Anthony Caparula
text: Not very good. Plane interior.  Slow service. Food not very good. Help polite and nice just very slow.

name: Brian Garrick
text: Nice place to grab a quick slice. The pizza is good and the staff friendly. My favorite is their Genoa slice.

name: James Rutherford
text: Manager needs to retire. I used to work next door and the employees would let me get the happy hour price w/o purchasing a drink. They were very nice about it. One day the manager walked in, glared at me, and then asked the waiter ‚Äúdid you ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Klepper
text: Only one girl working tonight though she looked busy, we still received awesome customer service. Decent pizza. Good selection of beer. Friendly staff. Felt like eating pizza at home with good sports on tv and tasty beer.

name: Keena Mills
text: I love the food everything is sooo good! Green pesto chicken pizza.üî•

name: Angela Echauri
text: AWESOME FOOD, EXCELLENT COOK. GOOD SERVICE. I'VE  TAKEN THE WHOLE FAMILY. AND THEY AGREE. EXCELLENT. ..

name: Valerie
text: Worst customer service I have ever experienced... on multiple occasions. It gets worse each time. Employees are rude and blame customers for THEIR MISTAKES and the manager is no better. Just glad this location is not representative of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Carl from Chicago
text: Went there for happy hour after work.  The three beers I asked for on draft on their wall were all out.  The servers seemed overwhelmed there were lots of customers.  We had to flag down other servers to get our orders and our check.  Else OK I guess they had the game on and prices not high.

name: B H Branham
text: Thought was just a Schmizza but it featured a full scale restaurant. Buffalo chicken sandwich and spinach salad was great. The place is obviously focused as a sports bar but we went on impulse during a quiet time. Music selection was good. Solid rock. Facilities were nice, clean.

name: Linzi K
text: They were really busy with a big party and the bartender/server kept up with that and other parties, including us, in the back of the place. Gave us some extra bread for the time we had to wait. Food was great and he was interactive with our family even though he was obviously busy

name: Esoteric Spiral
text: Prejudice owner will be rude and disrespectful and then tell you to leave if you complain about it and keep your money for the food you ordered and never received. Do not support this establishment! It is white and middle class owned and only serves that demographic.

name: ·ñ¥·ñáO·òúTO·ó¥
text: The pizza was delicious, the perfect mix, ooey gooey but held itself together. And the waitress was extremely kind. The cook wasn't in at the moment so we could only have slices (which were still good, not complaining) but my stepmom didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Sowers
text: Got a delivery for Schmizza it said 15 minutes. I arrive after 10 and am told it will be an additional 45 minutes. Older gentlemen who was an owner or manager was a total jerk about it too.

name: Annie McGlincey
text: Spectacular pizza and avail. By the slice! Friendly staff, variety of beverages. I love this place!

name: Karen Rice
text: Their pizza is so-so. I have tried 2 of their pastas and I wouldn‚Äôt reorder them again. When I first went there to eat, the bartender asked me what I would like to drink. I said a Lemon Drop Martini. He not only says he doesn‚Äôt know how to ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris
text: Good food. Slow service

text: Awesome service great prices love this place!!

name: test Again
text: bare hand handle everything, very rude. not recommend this pizza place to anyone

name: Jon Deveaux
text: Genoa pizza and quick easy service

name: Andrew Reyna
text: Pizza was amazing, service was next level, and the atmosphere was stellar. I will be back!

name: T C
text: Absolute dumpster fire location. Fire your staff before you go bankrupt.

name: Brass Tacks
text: Considering their name, I didn't expect them to have a menu that included items other than Pizza, but they sure do.  Good service.  Good prices.

name: Duley Lyons
text: Pizzas great, beers great, an Cowboys great

name: Julie Shaughnessy
text: Service and Pizza is great..

name: Sami Cregger
text: Great atmosphere and food, but you need to open up the front seating areas in the evenings. We used to really enjoy sitting there.

name: Adam Manson
text: Great pizza! It's the best pizza around. The beer selection is good too. They usually have good deals in the Entertainment Book, and they email out deals if you sign up on the website.

name: Mike Parker
text: Pretty bad management. Went there twice. The first time the owner just pointed to where I sit and walked other customers over which were white. Waited 15 minutes before someone came to take my order and they were not busy. The waiter was ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Deegan
text: The spicy Thai chicken pizza with peanut sauce was delicious!!!

name: JoeSells
text: Just ordered a slice and a bear at this place. Service is great, super friendly and the pizza is great! Unfortunately though, i happen to be there when the "boss" was in... he criticized the bartender harshly right in front of me!! Over my ‚Ä¶More

name: James Rutherford
text: Rick the Owner/Manager is a joke!!! Bullies staff infront of customers, argues with customers and is embarrassingly arrogant! Stay away from this hell hole. Or at least when Rick‚Äôs there.

name: Timothy Shaw
text: Overated pizza, just plain Jane.

name: Bryan Kemper
text: Relaxing and great service,music atmosphere. üëç

text: I went to the pizza place with my family the owner or the Store manager was there. My two-year-old toddler was talking a little loud. He sent The person That was serving us to tell us to leave because my son was being too loud and we where ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Matsell
text: Nice location but the counter argued with me about the pizza and I was right and then I got the smallest coldest slice. Other locations are better

name: TimJon M
text: Fantastic drink pours from this bar. Didnt try the food unfortunately

name: Larry Bates
text: Really good happy hour

name: A Brady
text: My local watering hole and pizza joint. Great happy hour deals (slice of cheese or pep with a beer is $5), friendly staff, and plenty of TVs to watch the game

name: Nicholas Schmidt
text: Great food, great atmosphere.

name: JMel Fields
text: super fast delivery..

name: Sean Barrett
text: Awesome staff. From 2pm-6pm and also 9pm-closing time is their happy hours. They provide a variety of happy hour options such as specific pizza slices, sandwiches, boneless wings and even a salad. PBR is $2.50 a pint during happy hour and ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Kulink
text: Good place for pizza and beer.  Above average tap list.  Offers gluten free pizza.

name: Elizabeth Wynn
text: Large pizza is the size of small anywhere else for the price of $20. The bad taste I had from the owners responses to previous 1star reviews continued in my mouth after I finished the pizza.

name: jacob mandes
text: Great food great service

name: Darrell Thorpe
text: Great place to watch Dallas Cowboys games...Rick & Jean are awesome owners.

name: Bryce Hahn
text: Pizza is always delicious and ready to eat (or if made to order, very quick) however being exclusively table service or pickup, I miss the self serve days

name: Scott Ostby
text: The Sunset hang out! Love it.

name: Judy Cole
text: Fun, clean place, good food and drinks, friendly service!

name: Rita J
text: Great beer selection, always a good game or two on TV. Quick service if you need to get to a game at Sunset HS or SAC.

name: Ronnie Coulam
text: Best place for a slice and football games on Saturdays and Sundays

name: Mindy Ivie
text: Had lunch with Hubby.  Great atmosphere, clean and friendly.

name: Steven Thomsen
text: Lottery machine said $934.xx wife hit collect and machine printed $46.xx they said complain to oregon lottery they are not responsible.  It.9:30 they close at 10 but we had to leave.  Never going there ever again.  They were rude and a ripoff!

name: Zach Child
text: Good happy hour deals, and didn't try any menu items aside from Pizza and wings but these were as good as you come to expect from schmizza
